title: Crumble top rhubarb cake
ingredients: ['For the cake', '250g unsalted butter, at room temperature', '250g caster sugar', '5 eggs', '1 teaspoon vanilla extract', '1 teaspon almond extract', 'zest and juice of 1/2 lemon', '300g plain flour', '2 teaspoons baking powder', '5 large stalks rhubarb, trimmed and finely chopped', 'For the crumble', '50g unsalted butter', '50g plain flour', '50g brown sugar', '1 teaspoon ground cinnamon', '1/2 teaspoon ground nutmeg']
